```{r results, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
df1 <- data_reg()
df <-  df1 %>%
  filter(!is.na(value)) %>%
  group_by(value) %>%
  summarise(n=n()) 

idmax <- which.max(df$n)

```

La region de **`r names(which(regiones_choices == input$region_numero))`** posee `r prettyNum(nrow(df1), big.mark = ".")`, de los cuales `r prettyNum(df$n[idmax], big.mark=".")` son `r names(which(region_indicador_choices == input$region_indicator))` `r df$value[idmax]`, `r percent(df$n[idmax]/sum(df$n))` (de los casos validos correspondientes al anio `r max_agno`).
